triples.name: Feature selection
triples.relevance: The paper addresses feature selection in fuzzy data with imbalanced datasets.

triples.name: Rough set
triples.relevance: Neighborhood rough set model is the foundation for the paper's feature selection approach.

triples.name: Entropy (information theory)
triples.relevance: Information entropy is used as a feature evaluation method for uncertainty information measures.

triples.name: Fuzzy logic
triples.relevance: Fuzzy data and fuzzy decision systems are central to the paper's problem domain.

triples.name: Greedy algorithm
triples.relevance: A local heuristic forward greedy selection algorithm is designed to select optimal feature subsets.

triples.name: Oversampling and undersampling in data analysis
triples.relevance: Related to handling imbalanced data which the paper addresses in its fuzzy feature selection method.
